content: in this legal case the parties involved were not mentioned the court proceedings lasted for 9 months and the court ruled in favor of one party but the details of the resolution were not specified the responsible party for covering the procedural costs was also not mentioned the harju county court made a decision on 15052023 which annulled a previous resolution the county court partially agreed with the claim and counterclaim resulting in the termination of joint ownership and division of joint assets the parties agreed to replace their consent and make entries in the land register the court also rejected xs claim regarding the termination of joint ownership of a peugeot 5008 car the court terminated the civil case and vacated a portion of the compromise agreement the parties agreed to terminate joint ownership and divide the assets as specified x agreed to pay an amount of 15000 euros to xs current account by 10102023 the parties confirmed that they will bear the costs of the proceedings x will receive half of the state fee paid for filing the appeal the appeal procedure will be appealed to the supreme court the circumstances of the procedure date back to 25052021 when x filed the lawsuit in 2022 the defendant filed a counterclaim regarding joint assets in 2021 a request was made to divide joint assets in a different manner in may 2023 a disputed decision was made regarding the termination of joint ownership of a peugeot 5008 car the county court dismissed the defendants claim and partially satisfied the claimants claim the court decided to divide the joint assets and allowed the claimant to make entries in the land register the court also awarded the defendant compensation for the loss of property the claimant filed an appeal to cancel part of the decision and requested sole ownership of a specific property the court will make a new decision regarding ownership and compensation the parties involved in the civil case submitted a compromise agreement to the district court for approval the district court approved the compromise agreement and partially annulled the county courts decision the parties are responsible for bearing the procedural costs the claimants request for a refund of the state fee paid was denied the parties also waived their right to appeal
